verses.name: 1 Kings 14:26
verses.text: And he took away the treasures of the house of the Lord, and the treasures of the king’s house; he even took away all: and he took away all the shields of gold which Solomon had made.

verses.name: 1 Kings 14:27
verses.text: And king Rehoboam made in their stead brasen shields, and committed them unto the hands of the chief of the guard, which kept the door of the king’s house.

verses.name: 1 Kings 14:28
verses.text: And it was so, when the king went into the house of the Lord, that the guard bare them, and brought them back into the guard chamber.
